general.lastNameInvalid: Please provide a lastname. Only letters are allowed.
general.firstNameInvalid: Please provide a firstname. Only letters are allowed.

alerts.languageWarning: Please fill out the form in english.
alerts.validationError: Please fill out the form correctly.
alerts.savingSuccess: Dataset saved successfully. The XML file download will start automatically.

restore.foundWithTimestamp: We found an autosaved draft from {timestamp}. Would you like to restore it?
restore.foundWithoutTimestamp: We found an autosaved draft from a previous session. Would you like to restore it?

resourceInfo.title: Resource Information
resourceInfo.doiValid: A new DOI will be registered.
resourceInfo.doiInvalid: Please use format 10.ORGANISATION/ID (i.e.: 10.57757/IUGG23-3081) or leave empty.
resourceInfo.publicationYearInvalid: Please provide a valid year ranging from 1901-2155 (4 digits in the format YYYY).
resourceInfo.resourceTitleInvalid: Please provide a descriptive title (that does not repeat the paper title, but describes the data).

contactPersons.contactPersonError: Please choose at least one contact person.
contactPersons.emailInvalid: Please provide a valid email address in the format xxx.xxx@xxx.xxx.

contributorInstitutions.title: Contributor (Institutions)
contributorInstitutions.organizationInvalid: Please enter a valid organization name.

descriptions.title: Descriptions
descriptions.abstractPlaceholder: Please enter an abstract of the data. Please do not repeat the abstract of a paper, but describe the data itself.
descriptions.methodsPlaceholder: Please enter a description of the methodology employed for the study or research.
descriptions.technicalinfoPlaceholder: Please enter detailed information that may be associated with design, implementation, operation, use, and/or maintenance of a process, system, or instrument.
descriptions.otherPlaceholder: Please enter other description information that does not fit into an existing category.

thesaurus.title: GCMD Thesauri
thesaurus.name: GCMD Thesauri Keywords
thesaurus.label: Open thesaurus to choose keywords or start typing...

free.title: Free Keywords
free.placeholder: Please enter keywords and separate them by a comma.

dates.title: Dates
dates.dateInvalid: Please enter a valid date between 01.01.1900 and 31.12.2100!
dates.embargoDateError: Embargo date must be after or equal to the creation date.

coverage.title: Spatial and Temporal Coverages
coverage.latitudeInvalid: Please enter a latitude between -90.00 and +90.00.
coverage.longitudeInvalid: Please enter a longitude between -180.00 and +180.00
coverage.descriptionPlaceholder: Please enter the description of the temporal and spatial coverage...
coverage.dateTimeInvalid: Please enter a valid date and time.
coverage.mapInfo: (Please choose coordinates with rectangle or marker)

funding.title: Funding Reference
funding.funderInvalid: Please enter the name of the funder.

technical.title: Technical
technical.errorHandlingInvalid: Only letters, numbers and . , ( ) - are allowed.

buttons.saveAsTooltip: Save the current data or content under a new file name.
buttons.submitTooltip: Transmit the entered data or content.

feedback.label: User Feedback
feedback.question1: Which functions of the new metadata editor do you find particularly helpful?
feedback.question2: Is there a particular design or user interface change that you like?
feedback.question3: What do you find positive about the usability of the new editor?
feedback.question4: Which functions of the new editor do you find difficult to use?
feedback.question5: Are there any aspects of the user interface that you find confusing or annoying?
feedback.question6: Do you miss certain functions in the new metadata editor?
feedback.question7: Is there a specific improvement you would like to see?

changelog.title: Changelog
changelog.aboutText: The ELMO Metadata Editor was developed in 2024 by students of the University of Applied Sciences Potsdam in cooperation with the German Research Centre for Geosciences and is released under the GNU General Public License, Version 2.
changelog.aboutHeading: About ELMO - Enhanced Laboratory Metadata Organizer
